!Trader Garette: Hey, youngster! You look like fortune smiled on you! Did your ship just come in? Or are you expecting something good to happen? If you have something to celebrate, let's have a drink! You've come to the right place, by the way. I just decided to discount everything in my shop. Buy whatever you need, my friend. Fortune comes easily to someone who is well-equipped! But a miserly adventurer faces a dim future...
